newsitem.title: USA: Rowan gets US govt loan guarantee for rig.
newsitem.headline: Rowan gets US govt loan guarantee for rig.

text.p: Rowan Cos Inc said on Friday the U.S. Department of Transportation's Maritime Administration has committed to provide a Title XI guarantee of a $153 million loan to finance the building of a new rig.
The floating-rate bank loan would be repaid semi-annually over 12 years after the "Rowan Gorilla V" rig was completed.
Rowan is an international and domestic offshore contract drilling and aviation services provider.
